Name: Snake, snake, snake!
About the game: Snake. You know it - snake. You really don't know? It's a moving line that eats fruit and grows infinitely until it dies. Anything new you may ask? Nothing, without counting local coop, shooting that transforms this gluttonous creature into a tank and constantly changing environment making absorbtion of you diet menu much harder.
